definition[0]: to give something to people, especially in fixed amounts
definition[1]: to officially provide something for people
note[1]: dispense justice (=decide whether or not someone is guilty of a crime and what punishment they should receive)
definition[2]: to officially prepare and give medicines to people
definition[3]: if a machine dispenses something, it gives it to someone who puts in money, a special number etc
example[2]: Four machines dispense a wide range of drinks and snacks.
definition[4]: to sell or give medicines to people
example[4]: A pharmacist will never dispense a prescription unless he or she is sure it is correct.
